column2: Show all political cheat options, These cheats focus on reforms and your populations ideologies.
Overwhelmingly convert your population to liberal ideology.
Overwhelmingly convert your population to fascist ideology.
Overwhelmingly convert your population to anarcho-liberal ideology.
Overwhelmingly convert your population to communist ideology.
Overwhelmingly convert your population to reactionary ideology.
Overwhelmingly convert your population to socialist ideology.
Overwhelmingly convert your population to conservative ideology.
Set voting reform to no voting.
Set voting reform to no voting.
Set voting reform to universal voting.
Selects social reforms, No Minimum Wage, No work hour limit and No safety.
Make slavery allowed in your nation.
Set all political reforms to the most democratic option.
Set all political reforms to the least democratic option.
Set all social reforms for full social security.
